array.txt: A computer science engineer-in-making, web developer, design buff and a web search enthusiast.
Currently, a 5th year undergrad student at Birla Institute of Technology and Science, Pilani. My major is in Mathematics and Computer Science.
Machine Learning, Neural Networks, Information Retrieval, Data Mining, Analytics, Visualization, OS, Distributed and cluster computing.
Presently at Pilani, Rajasthan. Hails from Allahabad, Uttar Pradesh. I love travelling and have travelled across all major destinations in India. Also lived briefly in Mumbai, Ahmedabad and Delhi.

Ranked 1st in the class of 57 students. Recieved the award for 'Best Student' for my academic achievements. Continuous reciepient of MCN Scholarship for 80% fee waiver in my university for maintaining a high GPA.

Eccentric love for good colors and design, I spent a brief amount of time in designing for web and dwelling in other web technologies. Created many websites, being a part of the student group at BITS Pilani.
C/C++, Java, Python (scipy, numpy, matplotlib, scikit-learn), HTML5/CSS3, JavaScript Django, NodeJS, PHP, SQL, MongoDB, Git Version Control, OpenCV, SSH.

Love to read and explicate on new topics, mostly related to computer science and web. Apart, enjoy reading crime fiction, thriller, mystery and suspense. Favorites: Sidney Sheldon, Dan Brown, Agatha Christie.
